.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkRenderPassBeginInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_RENDER_PASS_BEGIN_INFO
* [[VUID-VkRenderPassBeginInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkDeviceGroupRenderPassBeginInfo
* [[VUID-VkRenderPassBeginInfo-renderPass-parameter]] pname:renderPass must: be a valid sname:VkRenderPass handle
* [[VUID-VkRenderPassBeginInfo-framebuffer-parameter]] pname:framebuffer must: be a valid sname:VkFramebuffer handle
* [[VUID-VkRenderPassBeginInfo-commonparent]] Both of pname:framebuffer, and pname:renderPass must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from the same sname:VkDevice
****
